ai-patthana15.48:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.48:0.3_0: keeps rolling on the body and mind,
ai-patthana15.48:1.1_0: mind rolled on to the eighteen mental phenomena. ...
ai-patthana15.48:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.48:2.1_0: mind and kept rolling by mind. ...
ai-patthana15.48:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.48:2.1_3: What’s the point of good will?
